title: Odachi of Blood
contents: text | This odachi is too large to wield normally unless you meet a specific strength requirement. You must have a Strength score of at least 18 or suffer disadvantage on all attacks made with this weapon
text | It deals 2d6 slashing damage, and an additional 1d6 necrotic damage against living creatures (not undead or a construct).
property | Extra long blade | You have disadvantage when you try to attack an enemy within 5 feet of you.
property | Bloodstirsty | When you attack a creature with this weapon and roll a 20 on the attack roll, you gain 2d6 temporary hit points.
property | Hunger | When you attack a creature with this weapon and roll a 1 on the attack roll. You lost all your temporary hit points, and take 2d4 necrotic damage.
